attributes.action: Sadiq Khan apology for allowing lighting to show EU flag on London Eye on NYE
attributes.background:
On NYE 2018/19 the London Eye was lit up blatantly in the colours of the EU flag, with european music and speeches in european languages.
This celebration was hijacked for political gain and the respect and feeling of leave voters was ignored.
Khan should apologise for this apology to the eu.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This would be a personal decision for the Mayor of London.
